# How to Report an Issue on GitHub: # Auala e Lipoti ai se Mataupu i GitHub
## Download Pretrained Models: ## La'u mai Fa'ata'ita'iga ua mae'a a'oa'oina
0 to ∞ separated by -: 0 i le ∞ e vavae'eseina i le -
1. Click on the 'Record Screen' button b: 1. Kiliki i le fa'amau 'Pueina le Lau' i lalo e amata ai ona pueina le mataupu o lo'o e feagai ai.
2. Once you have finished recording the: 2. A mae'a loa ona e pueina le mataupu, kiliki i le fa'amau 'Taofi le Pueina' (o le fa'amau lava lea e tasi, ae e suia le igoa e fa'atatau i le o e pueina pe leai).
3. Alu i le [Mataupu i GitHub](https://github.com/IAHispano/Applio/issues) ma kiliki i le fa'amau 'Mataupu Fou'.
4. Complete the provided issue template,: 4. Fa'atumu le fa'ata'ita'iga o le mataupu ua saunia, ia mautinoa e aofia ai fa'amatalaga e mana'omia, ma fa'aaoga le vaega o aseta e lafo a'e ai le faila na pueina mai le laasaga muamua.
A simple, high-quality voice conversion: O se meafaigaluega faigofie, maualuga lona tulaga mo le liua o leo e taula'i i le faigofie ona fa'aaoga ma le lelei o lona fa'atinoga.
Adding several silent files to the train: O le fa'aopoopoina o ni faila filemu i le seti a'oa'oga e mafai ai e le fa'ata'ita'iga ona taulimaina le filemu atoatoa i faila leo ua fa'atatauina. Filifili le 0 pe a fai o lau seti fa'amaumauga e mama ma ua iai ni vaega o le filemu atoatoa.
Adjust the input audio pitch to match th: Fetu'una'i le maualuga o le leo o le leo fa'aulu e fa'afetaui ma le laina o le fa'ata'ita'iga leo.
Adjusting the position more towards one: O le fetu'una'iina o le tulaga ia sili atu i le tasi itu po'o le isi itu o le a fa'atupuina ai le fa'ata'ita'iga ia sili atu ona tutusa ma le muamua po'o le lona lua.
Adjusts the final volume of the converte: Fetuuna'i le leo mulimuli o le leo ua liua pe a uma ona fa'agaoioia.
Adjusts the input volume before processi: Fetuuna'i le leo fa'aulu a'o le'i fa'agaoioia. E puipuia ai le tipiina po'o le si'itia o se masini faaleotele leo filemu.
Adjusts the volume of the monitor feed,: Fetuuna'i le leo o le mata'itū, e tuto'atasi mai le leo autū e alu atu.
Amount of extra audio processed to provi: Le aofa'i o leo fa'aopoopo e fa'agaoioia e tu'uina atu ai se fa'amatalaga i le fa'ata'ita'iga. E fa'aleleia ai le tulaga o le liua ae e maualuga atu le fa'aaogaina o le CPU.
Ma filifili le fua fa'atatau o le fa'ata'ita'iga.
Apply a soft autotune to your inferences: Fa'aaoga se autotune vaivai i au fa'atatauga, fautuaina mo le liua o pese.
Fa'aaoga le bitcrush i le leo.
Fa'aaoga le chorus i le leo.
Fa'aaoga le tipiina i le leo.
Fa'aaoga le compressor i le leo.
Fa'aaoga le tuai i le leo.
Fa'aaoga le fa'aleagaina i le leo.
Fa'aaoga le gain i le leo.
Fa'aaoga le limiter i le leo.
Fa'aaoga le fesiita'iga o le maualuga o le leo i le leo.
Fa'aaoga le reverb i le leo.
Audio buffer size in milliseconds. Lower: Le tele o le fa'aputuga o leo i milisekone. O tau maualalo e ono fa'aitiitia ai le tuai ae fa'ateleina le avega a le CPU.
Audio file slicing method: Select 'Skip': Metotia mo le tipiina o faila leo: Filifili le 'Fa'amisi' pe a fai ua uma ona tipiina faila, 'Faigofie' pe a fai ua uma ona aveese le tele o le filemu mai faila, po'o le 'Otometi' mo le otometi ona iloa o le filemu ma tipiina fa'ata'amilo ai.
Audio normalization: Select 'none' if th: Fa'atonuina o le leo: Filifili le 'leai' pe a fai ua uma ona fa'atonuina faila, 'mua' e fa'atonuina le faila fa'aulu atoa i le taimi e tasi, po'o le 'tua' e fa'atonuina ta'itasi vaega.
Bitcrush Bit Depth: Loloto o le Bit o le Bitcrush
Browse presets for formanting: Su'e ni fa'atulagaga ua saunia mo le fa'avasegaina o leo
Cache Dataset in GPU: Fa'aputu le Seti Fa'amaumauga i totonu o le GPU
Cache the dataset in GPU memory to speed: Fa'aputu le seti fa'amaumauga i le manatua o le GPU e fa'avave ai le fa'agasologa o le a'oa'oga.
Check which version of Applio is the lat: Siaki po'o fea le lomiga lata mai o le Applio e va'ai ai pe e te mana'omia se fa'afouga.
Choose the model architecture:\n- **RVC:
Filifili le fausaga o le fa'ata'ita'iga:
- **RVC (V2)**: Filifiliga fa'aletonu, e fetaui ma tagata fa'aaoga uma.
- **Applio**: Tulaga maualuga ma vocoders fa'aleleia ma fua fa'atatau o le fa'ata'ita'iga maualuga, mo na'o le Applio.
Choose the vocoder for audio synthesis:\:
Filifili le vocoder mo le gaosiga o leo:
- **HiFi-GAN**: Filifiliga fa'aletonu, e fetaui ma tagata fa'aaoga uma.
- **MRF HiFi-GAN**: E sili atu lona fa'amaoni, mo na'o le Applio.
- **RefineGAN**: Tulaga sili ona lelei o le leo, mo na'o le Applio.
Clean your audio output using noise dete: Fa'amama lau leo fa'aola e ala i le fa'aaogaina o algorithms e iloa ai le pisa, fautuaina mo leo tautala.
Clear Outputs (Deletes all audios in ass: Fa'amama Mea Fa'aola (Tape uma leo i totonu o aseta/leo)
Click the refresh button to see the pret: Kiliki le fa'amau fa'afou e va'ai ai le faila ua mae'a a'oa'oina i le lisi pa'u i lalo.
Default value is 1.0: O le tau fa'aletonu o le 1.0
Detect overtraining to prevent the model: Iloa le so'ona a'oa'oina e puipuia ai le fa'ata'ita'iga mai le a'oa'oina lelei tele o fa'amaumauga a'oa'oga ma leiloa ai le mafai ona fa'alautele i fa'amaumauga fou.
Determine at how many epochs the model w: Fa'amautu pe fia ni epoch e sefe ai le fa'ata'ita'iga.
Drag and drop your model here: Toso ma tu'u i lalo lau fa'ata'ita'iga iinei
Drag your .pth file and .index file into: Toso lau faila .pth ma lau faila .index i totonu o lenei avanoa. Toso le tasi ona sosoo ai lea ma le isi.
Drag your plugin.zip to install it: Toso lau plugin.zip e fa'apipi'i ai
Duration of the fade between audio chunk: Le umi o le mou malie atu i le va o vaega o leo e puipuia ai ni kiliki. O tau maualuluga e fa'atupuina ai ni suiga lamolemole ae ono fa'ateleina ai le tuai.
Enable Applio integration with Discord p: Fa'agaoioi le tu'ufa'atasiga a le Applio ma le i ai i le Discord
Enable formant shifting. Used for male t: Fa'agaoioi le fesiita'iga o le formant. E fa'aaogaina mo le liua mai le leo o le tane i le fafine ma le fa'afeagai.
Enable this setting only if you are trai: Fa'agaoioi lenei fa'atulagaga pe a na'o le a'oa'oina o se fa'ata'ita'iga fou mai le amataga po'o le toe amataina o le a'oa'oga. E tape uma ai fua fa'atatau na muai gaosia ma ogalaau o le tensorboard.
Enables Voice Activity Detection to only: E fa'agaoioia ai le Su'esu'ega o Galuega a le Leo (Voice Activity Detection) e na'o le fa'agaoioia o leo pe a e tautala, e sefe ai le CPU.
Enables memory-efficient training. This: E mafai ai ona a'oa'oina lelei le manatua. E fa'aitiitia ai le fa'aaogaina o le VRAM i le tau o le telegese o le saoasaoa o le a'oa'oga. E aoga mo GPU e fa'atapula'aina le manatua (fa'ata'ita'iga, <6GB VRAM) po'o le taimi e a'oa'o ai ma se tele o le fa'aputuga e sili atu nai lo le mea e mafai e lau GPU ona ofi ai.
Enabling this setting will result in the: O le fa'agaoioina o lenei fa'atulagaga o le a mafua ai ona sefe e faila G ma D na'o a latou lomiga lata mai, ma fa'asaoina lelei ai le avanoa e teu ai.
Enter dataset name: Tu'u i totonu le igoa o le seti fa'amaumauga
Enter input path: Tu'u i totonu le ala fa'aulu
Enter model name: Tu'u i totonu le igoa o le fa'ata'ita'iga
Enter output path: Tu'u i totonu le ala fa'aola
Enter path to model: Tu'u i totonu le ala i le fa'ata'ita'iga
Enter preset name: Tu'u i totonu le igoa o le fa'atulagaga ua saunia
Enter text to synthesize: Tu'u i totonu le tusitusiga e gaosia
Tu'u i totonu le tusitusiga e gaosia.
Enter your nickname: Tu'u i totonu lou igoa tauvalaau
Export Preset: Auina atu le Fa'atulagaga ua Saunia
For ASIO drivers, selects a specific inp: Mo aveta'avale ASIO, filifili se alalaupapa fa'aulu fa'apitoa. Tu'u i le -1 mo le fa'aletonu.
For ASIO drivers, selects a specific mon: Mo aveta'avale ASIO, filifili se alalaupapa mata'itū fa'apitoa e alu atu. Tu'u i le -1 mo le fa'aletonu.
For ASIO drivers, selects a specific out: Mo aveta'avale ASIO, filifili se alalaupapa fa'apitoa e alu atu. Tu'u i le -1 mo le fa'aletonu.
For WASAPI (Windows), gives the app excl: Mo le WASAPI (Windows), e tu'uina atu ai i le polokalama le pule fa'apitoa mo se avanoa e maualalo ai le tuai.
Get information about the audio: Maua fa'amatalaga e uiga i le leo
I agree to the terms of use: Ou te malie i tu'utu'uga o le fa'aaogaina
Fa'atele pe fa'aitiitia le saoasaoa o le TTS.
Influence exerted by the index file; a h: A'afiaga e fa'atinoina e le faila fa'asino; o se tau maualuga e fetaui ma se a'afiaga sili atu. Ae peita'i, o le filifilia o tau maualalo e mafai ona fesoasoani e fa'aitiitia ai mea sese o lo'o i totonu o le leo.
Input path for text file: Ala fa'aulu mo le faila tusitusiga
Introduce the model link: Fa'ailoa le so'oga o le fa'ata'ita'iga
Introduce the model pth path: Fa'ailoa le ala pth o le fa'ata'ita'iga
It will activate the possibility of disp: O le a fa'agaoioia ai le avanoa e fa'aalia ai le gaioiga o lo'o iai nei a le Applio i le Discord.
It's advisable to align it with the avai: E fautuaina le fa'aogatusa ma le VRAM o lo'o avanoa i lau GPU. O se fa'atulagaga o le 4 e ofoina mai ai le sa'o sili atu ae telegese le fa'agasologa, a'o le 8 e maua ai i'uga vave ma masani.
It's recommended keep deactivate this op: E fautuaina le fa'agata o lenei filifiliga pe a fai ua uma ona fa'agasolo lau seti fa'amaumauga.
It's recommended to deactivate this opti: E fautuaina le fa'agata o lenei filifiliga pe a fai ua uma ona fa'agasolo lau seti fa'amaumauga.
KMeans is a clustering algorithm that di: O le KMeans o se algorithm fa'avasega lea e vaevaeina ai le seti fa'amaumauga i ni K fa'aputuga. O lenei fa'atulagaga e sili ona aoga mo seti fa'amaumauga tetele.
Length of the audio slice for 'Simple' m: Umi o le vaega o le leo mo le metotia 'Faigofie'.
Length of the overlap between slices for: Umi o le feso'ota'iga i le va o vaega mo le metotia 'Faigofie'.
Male voice models typically use 155.0 an: O fa'ata'ita'iga leo o tane e masani ona fa'aaoga le 155.0 ma fa'ata'ita'iga leo o fafine e masani ona fa'aaoga le 255.0.
Model Author Name: Igoa o le Tufuga o le Fa'ata'ita'iga
Model used for learning speaker embeddin: Fa'ata'ita'iga e fa'aaogaina mo le a'oa'oina o le fa'apipi'iina o le failauga.
Move files to custom embedder folder: Si'i faila i le faila embedder fa'apitoa
Igoa o le seti fa'amaumauga fou.
Noise Reduction Strength: Malosi o le Fa'aitiitiga o le Pisa
Output ASIO Channel: Alalaupapa Alu Atu a le ASIO
Output Path for RVC Audio: Ala Fa'aola mo le Leo RVC
Output Path for TTS Audio: Ala Fa'aola mo le Leo TTS
Overtraining Detector: Masini e Iloa ai le So'ona A'oa'oina
Overtraining Detector Settings: Fa'atulagaga o le Masini e Iloa ai le So'ona A'oa'oina
Ala i le faila o le seti fa'amaumauga.
Pitch Shift: Fesiita'iga o le Maualuga o le Leo
Pitch Shift Semitones: Fesiita'iga o le Maualuga o le Leo Semitones
Pitch extraction algorithm: Algorithm mo le aveeseina o le maualuga o le leo
Pitch extraction algorithm to use for th: Algorithm mo le aveeseina o le maualuga o le leo e fa'aaoga mo le liua o le leo. O le algorithm fa'aletonu o le rmvpe, lea e fautuaina mo le tele o tulaga.
Please ensure compliance with the terms: Fa'amolemole ia mautinoa le usita'ia o tu'utu'uga ma aiaiga o lo'o fa'amatalaina i [lenei pepa](https://github.com/IAHispano/Applio/blob/main/TERMS_OF_USE.md) a'o le'i fa'aauauina lau fa'atatauga.
Fa'amolemole ia mautinoa le usita'ia o aiaiga ma tu'utu'uga o lo'o fa'amatalaina i [lenei pepa](https://github.com/IAHispano/Applio/blob/main/TERMS_OF_USE.md) a'o le'i fa'aauauina lau taimi moni.
Fa'amolemole ia mautinoa le usita'ia o tu'utu'uga ma aiaiga o lo'o fa'amatalaina i [lenei pepa](https://github.com/IAHispano/Applio/blob/main/TERMS_OF_USE.md) a'o le'i fa'aauauina lau a'oa'oga.
Post-process the audio to apply effects: Fa'agasolo mulimuli le leo e fa'aoga ai ni a'afiaga i le mea fa'aola.
Preset Name: Igoa o le Fa'atulagaga ua Saunia
Presets are located in /assets/formant_s: O fa'atulagaga ua saunia o lo'o i totonu o le faila /assets/formant_shift
Proposed Pitch Threshold: Tapula'a Fautuaina o le Maualuga o le Leo
Quefrency for formant shifting: Quefrency mo le fesiita'iga o le formant
Refresh Custom Pretraineds: Fa'afou Fa'ata'ita'iga Fa'apitoa ua mae'a A'oa'oina
Safeguard distinct consonants and breath: Puipuia konesane ma'oti ma leo o le mānava e taofia ai le masaesae o le leo eletise ma isi mea sese. O le tosoina o le parameter i lona tau aupito maualuga o le 0.5 e ofoina mai ai se puipuiga atoatoa. Ae peita'i, o le fa'aitiitia o lenei tau e ono fa'aitiitia ai le lautele o le puipuiga a'o ono fa'aitiitia ai le a'afiaga o le fa'asino.
Search Feature Ratio: Fua Fa'atatau o le Vaega Su'e
Select Custom Preset: Filifili le Fa'atulagaga Fa'apitoa ua Saunia
Select file to import: Filifili le faila e fa'aulufale mai
Select the TTS voice to use for the conv: Filifili le leo TTS e fa'aaoga mo le liua.
Select the custom pretrained model for t: Filifili le fa'ata'ita'iga fa'apitoa ua mae'a a'oa'oina mo le discriminator.
Filifili le fa'ata'ita'iga fa'apitoa ua mae'a a'oa'oina mo le generator.
Select the device for monitoring your vo: Filifili le masini mo le mata'ituina o lou leo (fa'ata'ita'iga, au mea fa'alogo).
Select the device where the final conver: Filifili le masini e lafo i ai le leo mulimuli ua liua (fa'ata'ita'iga, se uaea fa'akomepiuta).
Select the folder containing the audios: Filifili le faila o lo'o i ai leo e liua.
Select the folder where the output audio: Filifili le faila e sefe ai leo fa'aola.
Filifili le fa'atulagaga e auina atu ai le leo.
Select the index file to be exported: Filifili le faila fa'asino e auina atu
Select the index file to use for the con: Filifili le faila fa'asino e fa'aaoga mo le liua.
Select the language you want to use. (Re: Filifili le gagana e te mana'o e fa'aaoga. (E mana'omia le toe amataina o le Applio)
Select the microphone or audio interface: Filifili le masini faaleotele leo po'o le feso'ota'iga leo o le a e tautala ai.
Select the precision you want to use for: Filifili le sa'o e te mana'o e fa'aaoga mo le a'oa'oga ma le fa'atatauga.
Select the pretrained model you want to: Filifili le fa'ata'ita'iga ua mae'a a'oa'oina e te mana'o e la'u mai.
Select the pth file to be exported: Filifili le faila pth e auina atu
Select the speaker ID to use for the con: Filifili le ID o le failauga e fa'aaoga mo le liua.
Select the theme you want to use. (Requi: Filifili le autu e te mana'o e fa'aaoga. (E mana'omia le toe amataina o le Applio)
Select the voice model to use for the co: Filifili le fa'ata'ita'iga leo e fa'aaoga mo le liua.
Select two voice models, set your desire: Filifili ni fa'ata'ita'iga leo se lua, fa'atulaga lau pasene fa'afefiloi e mana'omia, ma fa'afefiloi i se leo fou atoa.
Set the autotune strength - the more you: Fa'atulaga le malosi o le autotune - o le tele o lou fa'ateleina, o le tele fo'i lea o lona pipi'i i le fa'asologa chromatic.
Fa'atulaga le loloto o le bit o le bitcrush.
Fa'atulaga le chorus nofoaga tutotonu tuai ms.
Fa'atulaga le loloto o le chorus.
Fa'atulaga le tali a le chorus.
Fa'atulaga le fa'afefiloi a le chorus.
Fa'atulaga le fua fa'atatau o le chorus Hz.
Set the clean-up level to the audio you: Fa'atulaga le tulaga fa'amama i le leo e te mana'o ai, o le tele o lou fa'ateleina o le a sili atu ona mama, ae e mafai ona sili atu ona fa'apipi'i le leo.
Fa'atulaga le tapula'a o le tipiina.
Fa'atulaga le osofa'iga a le compressor ms.
Fa'atulaga le fua fa'atatau a le compressor.
Fa'atulaga le tu'u sa'oloto a le compressor ms.
Fa'atulaga le tapula'a a le compressor dB.
Fa'atulaga le damping o le reverb.
Fa'atulaga le tali a le tuai.
Fa'atulaga le fa'afefiloi a le tuai.
Fa'atulaga le gain o le fa'aleagaina.
Fa'atulaga le dry gain o le reverb.
Fa'atulaga le freeze mode o le reverb.
Fa'atulaga le taimi tu'u sa'oloto a le limiter.
Fa'atulaga le tapula'a a le limiter dB.
Set the maximum number of epochs you wan: Fa'atulaga le numera aupito maualuga o epochs e te mana'o e taofi ai le a'oa'oina o lau fa'ata'ita'iga pe a leai se fa'aleleia atili e iloa.
Set the pitch of the audio, the higher t: Fa'atulaga le maualuga o le leo, o le maualuga o le tau, o le maualuga fo'i lea o le leo.
Fa'atulaga le fesiita'iga o le maualuga o le leo semitones.
Fa'atulaga le tele o le potu o le reverb.
Fa'atulaga le wet gain o le reverb.
Fa'atulaga le lautele o le reverb.
Specifies the overall quantity of epochs: Fa'amaoti mai le aofa'i atoa o epochs mo le fa'agasologa o le a'oa'oga o le fa'ata'ita'iga.
Specify the number of GPUs you wish to u: Fa'amaoti mai le numera o GPU e te mana'o e fa'aaoga mo le aveeseina e ala i le tu'uina i totonu e vavae'eseina i ni fa'alava (-).
Split the audio into chunks for inferenc: Vaevae le leo i ni vaega mo le fa'atatauga ina ia maua ai ni i'uga sili atu i nisi tulaga.
Substitute or blend with the volume enve: Sui pe fa'afefiloi ma le teutusi o le leo o le mea fa'aola. O le latalata o le fua fa'atatau i le 1, o le tele fo'i lea o le fa'aaogaina o le teutusi o le mea fa'aola.
The GPU information will be displayed he: O le a fa'aalia iinei fa'amatalaga o le GPU.
The audio file has been successfully add: Ua manuia le fa'aopoopoina o le faila leo i le seti fa'amaumauga. Fa'amolemole kiliki le fa'amau sauniuni.
The button 'Upload' is only for google c: O le fa'amau 'Lafo A'e' e mo na'o le google colab: E lafo a'e ai faila ua auina atu i le faila ApplioExported i lau Google Drive.
The f0 curve represents the variations i: O le f0 curve e fa'atusalia ai suiga i le taimi o le leo i le aluga o taimi, e fa'aalia ai le si'i ma le pa'u o le maualuga o le leo.
The file you dropped is not a valid pret: O le faila na e tu'uina i lalo e le o se faila ua mae'a a'oa'oina. Fa'amolemole toe taumafai.
The name that will appear in the model i: O le igoa o le a aliali mai i fa'amatalaga o le fa'ata'ita'iga.
The number of CPU cores to use in the ex: O le numera o autu o le CPU e fa'aaoga i le fa'agasologa o le aveeseina. O le fa'atulagaga fa'aletonu o autu o lau cpu, lea e fautuaina mo le tele o tulaga.
The output information will be displayed: O le a fa'aalia iinei fa'amatalaga fa'aola.
The path to the text file that contains: O le ala i le faila tusitusiga o lo'o i ai mea mo le tusitusiga i le tautalaga.
The path where the output audio will be: O le ala e sefe ai le leo fa'aola, e fa'aletonu i totonu o aseta/leo/output.wav
O le fua fa'atatau o le fa'ata'ita'iga o faila leo.
This setting enables you to save the wei: O lenei fa'atulagaga e mafai ai ona e sefeina fua fa'atatau o le fa'ata'ita'iga i le fa'ai'uga o epoch ta'itasi.
Timbre for formant shifting: Timbre mo le fesiita'iga o le formant
Upload Audio Dataset: Lafo A'e le Seti Fa'amaumauga Leo
Upload Pretrained Model: Lafo A'e le Fa'ata'ita'iga ua mae'a A'oa'oina
Utilize pretrained models when training: Fa'aaoga fa'ata'ita'iga ua mae'a a'oa'oina pe a a'oa'oina lau oe lava. O lenei auala e fa'aitiitia ai le umi o le a'oa'oga ma fa'aleleia atili ai le tulaga aoao.
Utilizing custom pretrained models can l: O le fa'aaogaina o fa'ata'ita'iga fa'apitoa ua mae'a a'oa'oina e mafai ona maua ai i'uga sili atu, aua o le filifilia o fa'ata'ita'iga sili ona talafeagai ua mae'a a'oa'oina e fa'atatau i le fa'aaogaga fa'apitoa e mafai ona fa'aleleia atili ai le fa'atinoga.
Volume level below which audio is treate: Le maualuga o le leo e manatu ai o le leo o le filemu ma e le fa'agaoioia. E fesoasoani e sefe ai punaoa a le CPU ma fa'aitiitia ai le pisa i tua.
E mafai fo'i ona e fa'aaogaina se ala fa'apitoa.
